page.title: 08The Vicar
page.content:
The Vicar has been in Exminster for 7 years. He is in charge of 2 churches, one in Kenn and one in Exminster. On a Sunday he unlocks the church at 7.30am and the day is spent taking services. During the week he visits hospitals and people in their homes. He goes to the school to talk to the children and has weddings and chistenings to organize.
The helpers in the church are two church wardens, an organist, a treasurer, 20 church councillors, bell ringers, some sidesmen and a grave digger.
The Vicar needed special training to do his job. He went to University and then to theological college where he learnt how to become a priest.
